history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER Carnegie Mellon University
TTS Okay, going to carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER 1700 Brownsville Road
TTS Okay, leaving from 1700 brownsville rd. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER 630 a.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 03:00 am.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say CHANGE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 47 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 18 mins to McKinley St at Brownsville Rd. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yeah.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the 54 to Fifth avenue at Bellefield avenue. It will depart at 4:06am. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 9 mins to 5000 Forbes avenue, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, USA. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yeah.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER Yeah.

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> This is route 2 of 4, to hear a different route say CHANGE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 54 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 1 min to Brownsville Rd at Crailo avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yeah.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the 51 to south 18th St at Josephine St. It will depart at 4:07am. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
